selected_quotes: Why gender can't be ignored when dealing with #domesticviolence: Blog by Gene Feder Lucy Potter in @ConversationUK
This is very welcome - the health sector has a real blind spot when it comes to recognising male victims
Why gender can't be ignored when dealing with #domesticviolence: Blog by Gene Feder Lucy Potter
Why we need to remember gender differences when we tackle domestic violence
#DomesticViolence: To ignore the impact of gender does a disservice to people of any gender. #PublicHealth #EndAbuse
